Whereas cancer, rare and orphan diseases, diabetes, and Alzheimer’s are just a few of a growing

Whereas many promising breakthroughs have occurred in biomedicine in recent years, including gene
			 therapies, molecularly targeted drugs, new modes of medical imaging and
			 radiosurgery, biomarkers for drug response, human genome sequencing, and
			 advances in bioinformatics that enabled many of these new applications;
